title: Accidentally moved in sujood & my nose didn't touch the ground, is prayer valid? assim al hakeem
transcript: If whileing to do it, I accidentally move like on accident and maybe my nose uh uh doesn't touch the ground for a short period of time. Would this invalidate my sujud? No, it would not impact your sujud. Anything done by mistake and unwillingly uh uh is not impacting your m your salat.
